column2: (let* ((user-file (make-temp-file "neovm-system-users-")) (group-file (make-temp-file "neovm-system-groups-"))) (call-process "/bin/sh" nil nil nil "-c" (concat "printf 'tmpuser:x:0:0::/tmp:/bin/sh\\n' > " user-file)) (call-process "/bin/sh" nil nil nil "-c" (concat "printf 'tmpgroup:x:0:\\n' > " group-file)) (setenv "NEOVM_PASSWD_PATH" user-file) (setenv "NEOVM_GROUP_PATH" group-file) (let ((users (system-users)) (groups (system-groups))) (setenv "NEOVM_PASSWD_PATH" nil) (setenv "NEOVM_GROUP_PATH" nil) (list users groups)))
